intro.title: Traceable Quality from Farm to Market
intro.description: While our processing facility will launch in 2031 to expand our product line, we currently offer premium raw cashews sourced from our 50-hectare family farm and trusted partner growers in Ivory Coast's cashew belt.

items.name: Raw Cashew Nuts
features: Traceable to partner farms in Ivory Coast

items.name: Cashew Butter
items.description: 100% pure, single-origin cashew butter with no additives
features: Creamy texture from premium Ivory Coast cashews
Rich in healthy fats (18g per serving)

items.name: Cashew Nut Shell Liquid
items.description: High-value industrial byproduct from our processing operations
features: Used in paints, varnishes and brake linings

items.name: Roasted Cashews
items.description: Premium dry-roasted cashews with optimal crunch
features: Three varieties: Natural, Lightly Salted, Spiced
Rich in copper, magnesium and antioxidants
